Activities should match with budget and other resources.
If the budget is not sufficient for the activities, cost-cuttingor foregoing other activities which are of lower prioritymay be needed.  If there are a lot of activities which thestaff are unable to do, alternatives include hiring a temporaryperson to augment the workforce or channelling t
